name: I Hate Santa!
description:
I Hate Santa!

All children of the world is a good kid.

The Santa determines the good kids and bad kids.

So I do not like Santa.

Controls:

Press the spacebar to start the game.

You can move playable character by left key and you can push button by right key.

This game is a result of making games in a week.

You must stop the Santa you want to enter the house as much as possible.

This game made using Unity3D.

Total Battery is

Gon Lee - Code, Art

and

BGM - White christmas.
